Select an image from your device and upload it as your new profile picture.

verification.success: Your account has been successfully activated. Now you don't have any feature limitation
verification.already_done: Your account has already been activated
verification.error: The verification token is either wrong or expired. Please try sending another verification mail from your account page

verification.banner: Your account hasn't been verified yet so that some features have been blocked to you. Please check your email inbox for the verification link. If you need to resend the verification email, you can press the following button:
verification.sent: The verification email has been sent.
verification.sendError: An unexpected exception has been raised while sending the email. Please try again later.

info.title: Email settings
info.variousEmailsCheckbox: Receive offers, suggestions and various emails from the platform
info.importantEmailsCheckbox: Receive emails about new platform features, improvements and security updates
info.emailDisclaimer: You will still receive critical emails regarding your account security or changes in the Terms of Service. This cannot be disabled. If you wish to delete your account please contact us.
info.success: Your email settings has been successfully updated. If you changed your email remember that you have to verify the new one.
info.extremeError: A major unknown exception has been raised while updating your email settings. Please try again later, maybe after reloading the page. If the error persist please contact support.

sessions.title: Active sessions
sessions.description: The following list contains every active session on this account. If you see an unrecognized or suspicious session please revoke it. For security reasons we also suggest you to change your password immediately after.
sessions.extremeError: There was an error while trying to retrieve active sessions. Please try again later. If the problem persists please contact support.

revert.title: Restore account
revert.invalid: This link is invalid, if the problem persists please contact support.
revert.description: Please reset your password, so that no one can log in without authorization. We also suggest checking your details in case something was changed by someone.
revert.unknownError: A major unknown exception has been raised during your account recover. Please try again later, maybe after reloading the page. If the error persist please contact support

recover.title: Account recovery

recover.resetDescription: Reset your password to access your account.

discover.description: Book your Private or your Professional Host Fisher all over the world, chose the best experience that fits your need and get ready for unique adventures

fullscreen.description: Find professional guides and private fishers. Next to you

private.title: Private Host Fisher:
private.description: Share the costs with a local Fisherman, a cheap solution for a great fishing day! It is very easy: find a buddy, chat with him, agree on the shared price and go fishing!

professional.title: Professional Guides and Charters:
professional.description: Tayloramade solutions for an unforgettable experience, meet our certified guides and discover new techniques

image_gallery.pre_header: Amazing Landscapes for unforgettable fishing trips

home.parallax: Shared experiences â€“ meet your private fisher all over the world, share the costs and get ready for unique experiences!

about.title: About us
about.header: TapAndFish: an Italian platform that takes you fishing all around the World
about.description: With TapAndFish you can book your fishing trip fast and safely.

guest.description: If you are an enthusiast, we offer plenty of options:
list: Share the expenses with a private fisher to be guided in unique and rare adventures
Book a charter or a professional guide: safety and quality guaranteed! A breathtaking fishing experience!
Fish, eat... and much more!

host.description: If you are an experienced fisher or a charter, choose TapAndFish:
list: Become a host fisher! Leave the rest to us!
Start your business! We'll help you manage it!
Not a professional? Earn by saving some money! Share the expenses or rent your boat, with or without a captain!

about.parallax: Pick TapAndFish[br]our team of experts will make fishing your dream job!

gofishing.title: Go fishing
gofishing.header: Fishing has never been that easy!
gofishing.question: What is TapAndFish?
gofishing.description: It's the leading platform to search and book charters and fishing guides.[br]TapAndFish is also promoting sharing economy: the price for the majority of events is set with the intent of splitting the expenses between participants.

hosts.question: Are you looking for a private or professional fisher?

list: Every event is tagged with <kbd>private user</kbd>
After you've seen the price, you can message the host, to ask for some proof of expenses and get more info on the event.
Bookings and payments can be canceled up to 48 hours before the event. Our client support is always available.
Every event is tagged with <kbd>professional user</kbd>
The price considers a guaranteed experience with included insurance.
Bookings and payments can be canceled up to 48 hours before the event. Our client support is always available.
You can message freely with all our guides to request a tailored experience!

guest.nav: How it works for the guest

list.name: Search
list.content: Search the fisher who best fits your needs, for you there are a lot of opportunities, such as:
list: Cheap events based on sharing expenses or on renting a boat, with or without a captain
Premium events with professional guides or charters.

list.name: Contact
list.content: Contact your host with our booking and instant messaging systems.[br]We'll ask you to create an account to save your details and set up insurance.

list.name: Book
list.content: After checking availability and agreeing on the event details with your host, book the event.[br]Authorize the payment and wait (24h max) for the host to accept your booking.[br]If the booking is accepted, the amount will be charged.

list.name: Review
list.content: Review your experience giving a simple feedback.[br]This will help us improving our platform and providing a better service.

host.nav: How it works for the host

list.name: Sign up
list.content: Sign up for free on the platform (in case you own a boat we will ask for some details to ensure safe navigation).

list.name: Publish
list.content: Publish your ad: go to the host management page and click "Create event"; you will be guided step by step to make it as efficient as possible.[br]As soon as you fill in all the details, you will be able to publish it online and share it with the community.

list.name: Manage
list.content: Manage all your bookings and transactions from a unique place.[br]We will help you collect feedback and will offer all the support in your host business.

list.name: Meet
list.content: After accepting and validating bookings, you will receive the contact information of the guest to plan the details of the event (place and time of the meet, itinerary, gear, etc...).[br]Remember that the payment will be transferred on your account after the event.

list.name: Review
list.content: Review your experience. Give a feedback to the gues and to our platform TapAndFish.[br]You will help us improve the booking system and the user experience!

becomehost.title: Become a host fisher
becomehost.header: Earn or save money with TapAndFish and join our community!
becomehost.for_privates: TapAndFish for PRIVATES: allows every private fisher to split with the community all the expenses of a fishing trip and to live amazing adventures together!
becomehost.for_professionals: TapAndFish for PROFESSIONALS: allows professional charters to create a free account and manage their business, with the help of our team of experts!

card.header: Learn how much you can earn

icons.title: Why joining[br]TapAndFish?
icons.content: Either you are a private or professional, you will get many advantages. Apart from saving or earning money, you will be able to grow in our network and aspire to become brand ambassador.

icons.title: TapAndFish secures[br]host fishers
icons.content: We secure all our hosts: guests cannot cancel bookings after 48 hours from the event.

icons.title: Verified[br]guests
icons.content: All of our guests are registered to the platform. We will take care of transactions and making sure the booking process will go smoothly.

becomehost.wanna_join: Do you want to join the platform?[br]Pick the right profile for you:

list: Not a professional guide?[br]Not a problem! Save some money splitting your expenses: we will help you find fishing buddies in our community
Publish your first ad defining the price, number of participants and expenses to split.
We will offer you all the support you need to become Brand Ambassador!
Are you a professional guide? Manage your business on our platform!
Publish your ads freely, we will give you an area to manage bookings and payments.
We accept any kind of event (cruises, trips, gastronomic experiences), the important part is fishing!

data.title: Saving
data.content: The cost of a fishing trip is based on your expenses (i.e. gear and fuel)

data.title: A dedicated platform
data.content: TapAndFish gives you an account and a page to publish your events and manage payments.

data.title: Visibility
data.content: If your dream is to become a fishing brand ambassador, this is the right place for you! Collecting positive feedback you will get the status of TapAndFish Pro Ambassador

data.title: WorldWide connection
data.content: TapAndFish gives you visibility to thousands of potential customers from all around the globe

data.title: A dedicated platform
data.content: TapAndFish gives you an account and a page to publish your events and manage payments.

data.title: Messaging, payments, business managment and support
data.content: These and many more tools will be given to you to manage your business!

tabs.header: Split your expenses or become a guid in three easy steps

publish.content: Create a profile, define the package you want to offer (fishing technique, species, availability). Remember to attach high quality pictures: you will likely get more bookings!

price.content: We will help you determine the right price to make your ad desirable. If you are a private host we suggest you put the right cost for the expenses you have.

meet.nav: Meet the guest[br] and "cast your bait"
meet.header: Meet the guest and cast your bait!
meet.content: After the event, you will get the money on your account. TapAndFish, easy!

ambassador.header: Every host fisher[br]can become a[br]BRAND AMBASSADOR!

list.title: Sponsorships
list.content: (we will provide, thanks to our partners, various annual prizes dependend on you performance, measured with feedbacks. [a]See how it works[/a])

list.title: Optimized position
list.content:
(ads on the first results page get on average 57% more 
bookings)
